title: Broken Chain ⛓️‍💥 Emoji: Meaning, Design & Where to Find It

steps.title: Yes, there is a broken chain emoji ⛓️‍💥 available across platforms.
steps.content: Yes, there is a broken chain emoji ⛓️‍💥 available across platforms. Approved in September 2023 as part of Emoji 15.1, the ⛓️‍💥 emoji is available on the latest Samsung devices (via One UI 6.0), Google’s Noto Emoji fonts (via Emoji 15.1), and iOS 17.4. [1] X Research source It looks like a metal chain that’s been forcefully snapped in half, with emphasis marks around the fracture point. Currently, it has limited support across platforms, so you may not see it as a single emoji design. To get the ⛓️‍💥 emoji: Combine the chains ⛓️ and collision 💥 emojis with a zero width joiner, creating the ZWJ in HTML with codes &zwj or &#8205 (or U+200D in Unicode). [2] X Research source Copy and paste the ⛓️‍💥 emoji : Highlight the ⛓️‍💥 emoji, right-click the mouse or trackpad, hit “Copy,” then go to the space you want to paste the emoji. Right-click the mouse or trackpad, and hit “Paste.”

steps.title: The ⛓️‍💥 emoji symbolizes freedom and liberty.
steps.content: The ⛓️‍💥 emoji symbolizes freedom and liberty. Globally, a broken chain is an emblem of freedom, and is often used to commemorate Abolition Days, Emancipation Days, and Independence Days. Use the ⛓️‍💥 emoji to talk about breaking free or letting go of something that’s holding you back. [3] X Research source “Happy Juneteenth ⛓️‍💥🖤✊🏽🌍” “Freedom is the oxygen of the soul ⛓️‍💥” “We’re breaking generational curses out here ⛓️‍💥⛓️‍💥⛓️‍💥”

steps.title: The ⛓️‍💥 emoji represents a break in a relationship or agreement.
steps.content: The ⛓️‍💥 emoji represents a break in a relationship or agreement. Whether you’re talking about a breakup, broken plans, or the end of a friendship, the ⛓️‍💥 emoji signals that things are over. Send it whenever you feel like you no longer have a connection to someone, or they’ve canceled on you at the last minute. [4] X Research source “She ⛓️‍💥 our plans at the last minute 🙄🙄🙄” “Hot take: friendship breakups are worse than relationship breakups ⛓️‍💥💔” “I broke up with Josh ⛓️‍💥 I’m going to rotting in bed for the next 2 months 😞”

steps.title: The ⛓️‍💥 emoji indicates personal growth and overcoming obstacles.
steps.content: The ⛓️‍💥 emoji indicates personal growth and overcoming obstacles. If you’re trying to become the best version of yourself , use the ⛓️‍💥 emoji to show you’re breaking free from bad habits and negative cycles. It means you’re committed to changing your behavior and taking the next steps to achieve greatness. [5] X Research source “Saying goodbye to bad habits this year ⛓️‍💥👋” “Breaking through every barrier in my way ⛓️‍💥💪😤” “Ready to break toxic cycles and achieve my highest potential ⛓️‍💥”

steps.title: The ⛓️‍💥 emoji might be used to symbolize a malfunction.
steps.content: The ⛓️‍💥 emoji might be used to symbolize a malfunction. There’s emphasis around the fracture point on the ⛓️‍💥 emoji, which can represent disconnection or a malfunction in various industries. Use ⛓️‍💥 to symbolize a broken hyperlink, broken supply chain, or broken code. [6] X Research source “FYI, the link you added is ⛓️‍💥” “The code is broken ⛓️‍💥 Could you look over it and help me fix it?” “If you order anything from China, it’s won’t come in time since the supply chain is ⛓️‍💥”

steps.title: The ⛓️‍💥 emoji can also be used to express you’re feeling broken.
steps.content: The ⛓️‍💥 emoji can also be used to express you’re feeling broken. Feeling broken means you’re emotionally overwhelmed and unable to cope with it, especially after dealing with a stressful or traumatic situation. [7] X Research source Whether you’re feeling broken from a hard week at work or are experiencing heartbreak, use the ⛓️‍💥 emoji to indicate you’re hurting and need support. “I’m feeling ⛓️‍💥 after the breakup 🥺” “I’ve never felt so brokenhearted ⛓️‍💥💔💔” “I’m absolutely ⛓️‍💥 after this 80 hour work week.”

steps.title: The ⛓️‍💥 emoji can mean you’re free from work and are ready to go out.
steps.content: The ⛓️‍💥 emoji can mean you’re free from work and are ready to go out. If you’ve clocked out of work and need to decompress, use the ⛓️‍💥 emoji to make plans and express your state of mind. You can attend a happy hour, hang out with friends, or simply walk your dog to unwind. “Weekend freedom never felt better ⛓️‍💥 🎉” “Just got off work ⛓️‍💥 Want to jog around the neighborhood?” “FINALLY free from work ⛓️‍💥⛓️‍💥⛓️‍💥 Let’s grab drinks to celebrate 🥂”

steps.title: Pair the ⛓️‍💥 with other emojis to create a fun and unique message.
steps.content: Pair the ⛓️‍💥 with other emojis to create a fun and unique message. Spice up a standard text message by adding some extra emojis to the mix. Not sure what to send? Here are a few examples to help you get started: ⛓️‍💥✊🇺🇸 = freedom 🥀💔⛓️‍💥🥺 = breakup 🚲⛓️‍💥 = broken bike chain 🔗➡️⛓️‍💥 = no longer locked in ⛓️‍💥💪🚀🏋️‍♂️⭐ = overcoming obstacles

steps.title: The ⛓️‍💥 emoji is just one of many tool and interlocking emojis.
steps.content: The ⛓️‍💥 emoji is just one of many tool and interlocking emojis. From the hammer emoji to the lock emoji , there are tons of ways to express yourself. Use any of the following emojis to spice up your texts or come up with your own secret message: 🔗 (link) ⛏️ (pick) ⚙️ (gear) ⛓️ (chains) 🔒 (locked) 🔧 (wrench) 🔨 (hammer) 🔓 (unlocked) 🔩 (nut and bolt) 🔐 (locked with key) 🔏 (locked with pen) ⚒️ (hammer and pick) 🖇️ (linked paper clips) 🛠️ (hammer and wrench)
